channel.title: Help with error code?
channel.description:
Hi, i was trying to add god spells to easyrsc source and get this error when i modify the spellhandler.java. Any help would be much appreciated.
And yes i have used the search button haha.
Thanks for looking.
[IMG]http://i668.photobucket.com/albums/vv50/bengina_87/error.jpg[/img]

item.title: Help with error code?
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Yea but just looked over and realised that i put in a extra space.

Smacks forehead.

Works fine now ty for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error code?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“bengina, post:3, topic:267740”]Thanks…

sent you a pm with alittle code to see if its rite.

Thanks once again[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2009, 05:43:30 pm[/size][hr]Still getting same error.

“Picks up computer…Walks to window… Stops and thinks (“hmmm to expensive”)…Picks up old monitor and throws”[/quote]

Did you try player.incExp(6, spell.getExp(), true, true); ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error code?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Ok, for the incExp method to work correctly you need to use (int, int, boolean, boolean). What you are using is (int, int, boolean), so all you need todo is add another true or false at the end of the incExp in line 588, and 784.

Read full topic
